backend/main.mo: Defines core backend data models for users, tasks, overtime, and dental avatars, along with state maps and defaults.
backend/migration.mo: Provides a migration that adds a description field to tasks by transforming old state into a new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of many frontend components and hooks used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component handling auth initialization, login, and authenticated app flow rendering.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Controls post‑login flow based on user role and profile status, including error and loading states.
frontend/src/components/auth/FirstManage: Empty or placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginScreen: Login UI allowing assistant or manager selection, storing role and token before initiating authentication.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleChoiceS: Post-auth role selection screen that reads pending role data and triggers assistant or manager selection mutations.
frontend/src/components/avatars/avatarMa: Empty placeholder file for avatar manifest data.
frontend/src/components/avatars/AvatarPi: Displays dental avatars with loading/error states and allows selecting an avatar ID.
frontend/src/components/avatars/DentalAv: Renders an SVG dental avatar or a fallback image if missing or invalid.
frontend/src/components/avatars/Generate: Generates a pastel-colored SVG avatar based on user initials.
frontend/src/components/avatars/ProfileA: Chooses between uploaded photo, dental avatar, or generated initials avatar based on available data.
frontend/src/components/badges/badges.ts: Defines static metadata for all available badges.
frontend/src/components/badges/BadgeShel: Displays all badges in a sheet, marking which ones are earned.
frontend/src/components/common/QueryErro: Full-screen error fallback showing an error message and retry button.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Top app header showing logo, profile info, theme/language controls, and menus for settings, badges, and logout.
Provides the main application layout with header, tabs, and conditional rendering of tasks, overtime, and manager pages based on active tab and admin status.
frontend/src/components/layout/LanguageS: Renders a dropdown for selecting the UI language and updates the current language via i18n.
frontend/src/components/layout/ThemeTogg: A button that toggles between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskAudi: Displays a table of completed tasks with user, type, comments, and photo indicators, built from task and profile data.
frontend/src/components/manager/TaskComp: Generates a bar chart showing how many tasks each user has completed using Recharts.
frontend/src/components/manager/UserPick: Provides a dropdown to select a user, showing avatars and usernames from profile data.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TabNa: Simple tab navigation bar that highlights the active tab and triggers tab changes.
frontend/src/components/overtime/Overtim: Form for adding or deducting overtime minutes with validation and mutation submission.
Shows a chronological list of overtime entries with color‑coded add/deduct indicators and formatted dates.
Calculates and displays total overtime minutes and a composite days/hours/minutes breakdown.
frontend/src/components/profile/PrivacyP: Panel allowing users to export cached data, navigate back, or clear local data and log out via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileO: Modal for initial user profile setup with username, initials, avatar selection, and optional photo upload, saving via profile APIs.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileP: Reusable photo upload field with preview, validation, removal, and upload progress display.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Profile settings panel allowing users to edit profile info, switch avatars, manage photos, and save updates.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CompleteTa: Dialog for marking a task complete with optional comment and before/after photo uploads.
frontend/src/components/tasks/CreateTask: Dialog for creating new tasks including title, description, and task type selection.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskCard.t: Displays a task card with type badges, description, completion status, and option to mark as complete.
frontend/src/components/tasks/TaskList.t: Renders a sorted list of tasks, prioritizing incomplete and higher‑priority types, and displays fallback text if empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides queries to fetch the caller’s user role and admin status using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useBadges.ts: Computes earned badges from overtime entries and completed tasks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDentalAvatars.ts: Fetches dental avatars from the backend and exposes a lookup helper.
frontend/src/hooks/useI18n.ts: Returns the i18n context for translations and ensures provider presence.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity login state, stored identities, and provides identity context.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerOvertime.ts: Fetches overtime entries for a specific user and provides a helper to format export data.
frontend/src/hooks/useManagerTasks.ts: Allows managers to fetch all task data for export.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotify.ts: Provides toast notifications and standardized error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useOvertime.ts: Fetches caller overtime entries and provides mutation to create new entries with cache updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that feature-specific hooks live elsewhere.
frontend/src/hooks/useRoleSelection.ts: Provides mutations to select assistant or manager roles and invalidates related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useTasks.ts: Fetches tasks and provides create, complete, and reset task mutations with optimistic updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Fetches and updates user profiles, including photo upload and admin-level profile listing.
frontend/src/i18n/I18nProvider.tsx: Provides an i18n context with language state, localStorage persistence, and a translation lookup helper.
frontend/src/i18n/translations.ts: Defines supported languages and translation dictionaries for UI strings.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind CSS base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, and a float animation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerDashbo: Provides a tabbed manager dashboard with overtime management and task statistics views.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerOverti: Lets managers view user overtime data, pick users, export entries to CSV, and see totals and history.
frontend/src/pages/manager/ManagerStatsP: Shows task statistics and audit logs and allows exporting full task data to CSV.
frontend/src/pages/OvertimePage.tsx: Displays overtime form, totals, and history, fetching entries and showing a loading state.
frontend/src/pages/TasksPage.tsx: Loads tasks, resets recurring tasks on mount, and renders the task list with a create-task dialog.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Exports an array of objects to a CSV file with proper escaping and browser download handling.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color system using OKLCH variables, custom animations, and typography/container-query/animate plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the app’s current ICP-based project state, feature notes, architectural decisions, and a list of known issues requiring fixes.
